oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Site of the Preston Taylor Homes, c.1950s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the site of the Preston Taylor Homes (Project Tenn. 5-8), c.1950s. Built in the mid-1950s as housing for African Americans, the Preston Taylor Homes are located in West Nashville and contain 550 units. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
